attributes.action: not allow the loan extension of Mr.Hicks and Mr. Gillett due to the financial implications their delays are having on Anfield and the surrounding areas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the current financial issues affecting the country jobs are of upmost importance. The creation jobs by the building of the new stadium for L.F.C. would give a much needed financial boost to one of the poorest areas in the country. By not allowing the extension of the loan to Mr.Hicks and Mr.Gillett you would force a sale which would in turn allow the club to be sold to a consortium or individual who would put the club and the local area before themselves.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
